title: Jimmy Hoffa - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/15/21
itunes:title: Jimmy Hoffa - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/15/21
description:
George Noory and investigative journalist Dan Moldea explore his research into the unsolved disappearance of Teamster leader Jimmy Hoffa in 1975, whether he was killed by the mob for his alleged involvement in the assassination of President John F. Kennedy, and where he believes Hoffa's body may be buried.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: A discussion on the mysterious disappearance of the labor leader in 1975.
